content: for pattern support please go to the questions thread here 1 do you know those yummy toffees called *sahne muh-muhs* little cream toffees hand cut and wrapped in yellow-white striped paper while knitting this shawl in these colours i rediscovered my love for these sweet cream candies hmmmmm maybe you d like to try them too a simple yet effective striped shawl worked in garter stitch from the top down choose your favorite colors and off we go german version available here 2 deutsche version hier 3 erhältlich 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/designs-by-isabell-kraemer/4066587/1-25 2 http //www bleib-kreativ de/anleitungen/isabell-kraemer 3 http //www bleib-kreativ de/anleitungen/isabell-kraemer
